scripts.test:generator:login: curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer $OPENAI_API_KEY" -d '{"model":"text-davinci-003","prompt":"Generate a basic test script template in Cypress for a Login simulating the main workflow for a Login","temperature":0,"max_tokens":500,"top_p":1.0,"frequency_penalty":0.5,"presence_penalty":0.0,"stop":["You:"]}' https://api.openai.com/v1/completions | jq -r '.choices[0].text' > cypress/e2e/basicLoginTemplate.js
